com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model

Class AllocateHostsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.AmazonWebServiceRequest
      • com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.AllocateHostsRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AllocateHostsRequest
extends AmazonWebServiceRequest
implements java.io.Serializable
    Container for the parameters to the AllocateHosts operation.

    Allocates a Dedicated host to your account. At minimum you need to specify the instance size type, Availability Zone, and quantity of hosts you want to allocate.

    See Also:
    AmazonEC2.allocateHosts(AllocateHostsRequest), Serialized Form

        Allowed Values: on, off

      • getInstanceType

        public java.lang.String getInstanceType()
        Specify the instance type that you want your Dedicated hosts to be configured for. When you specify the instance type, that is the only instance type that you can launch onto that host.

        Specify the instance type that you want your Dedicated hosts to be configured for. When you specify the instance type, that is the only instance type that you can launch onto that host.
